title: Teaching reading in the upper primary school
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, John Morris and Ron Saunders
brief_description: Details the format for a program for the teaching of reading, based on the individual reading interests of students. Shows how a classroom situation is structured, and the course is developed through various stages.
